20110111190053.000|20110111190055.000|TR0|only state in the lower 48 entirely

20110111190925.000|20110111190928.000|TR0|says he wonders what might have been 
20110111190928.000|20110111190930.000|TR0|different had he answered Loughner's call.
20110111190930.000|20110111190933.000|TR0|
20110111190933.000|20110111190936.000|TR0|Some new developments in the story that 
20110111190936.000|20110111190938.000|TR0|consumed the country for much of last 
20110111190938.000|20110111190941.000|TR0|year.  Preventable, but almost inevitable, 
20110111190941.000|20110111190943.000|TR0|that is the scathing takeaway from the 
20110111190943.000|20110111190946.000|TR0|National Oil Spill Commission's final 
20110111190946.000|20110111190949.000|TR0|report on the Gulf oil disaster.  
20110111190949.000|20110111190951.000|TR0|According to the presidential panel, human 
20110111190951.000|20110111190954.000|TR0|and engineering failures were the 
20110111190954.000|20110111190956.000|TR0|immediate causes of the Deepwater Horizon 
20110111190956.000|20110111190959.000|TR0|blowout in April, with BP, Transocean and 
20110111190959.000|20110111191001.000|TR0|Halliburton sharing blame.
20110111191001.000|20110111191004.000|TR0|
20110111191004.000|20110111191007.000|TR0|The commission also faulted what it called 
20110111191007.000|20110111191009.000|TR0|years of industry and government 
20110111191009.000|20110111191012.000|TR0|complacency and a lack of attention to 
20110111191012.000|20110111191014.000|TR0|safety.  Among its proposals, tougher 
20110111191014.000|20110111191017.000|TR0|government oversight and bigger fines.
20110111191017.000|20110111191019.000|TR0|
20110111191019.000|20110111191022.000|TR0|Up next, not on their watch.  The plan 
20110111191022.000|20110111191025.000|TR0|some Arizonans have for potential protests 
20110111191025.000|20110111191027.000|TR0|at Tucson funerals.
20110111191027.000|20110111191030.000|TR0|
20110111191030.000|20110111191032.000|TR0|(COMMERCIAL BREAK)
20110111191032.000|20110111191035.000|TR0|
20110111191035.000|20110111191037.000|TR0|SAVIDGE:  Many Arizonans are expressing 
20110111191037.000|20110111191040.000|TR0|outrage today over plans for a protest at 
20110111191040.000|20110111191043.000|TR0|Christina Green's funeral.  Green was the 
20110111191043.000|20110111191045.000|TR0|youngest victim of Saturday's rampage in 
20110111191045.000|20110111191048.000|TR0|Tucson.  The controversial church has 
20110111191048.000|20110111191050.000|TR0|announced plans to stage a protest at her 
20110111191050.000|20110111191053.000|TR0|funeral Thursday.
20110111191053.000|20110111191055.000|TR0|
20110111191055.000|20110111191058.000|TR0|Westboro Baptist Church has become 
20110111191058.000|20110111191101.000|TR0|notorious for using funerals to publicize 
20110111191101.000|20110111191103.000|TR0|the notion that God is punishing America 
20110111191103.000|20110111191106.000|TR0|for tolerating homosexuals.  A member of 
20110111191106.000|20110111191108.000|TR0|the Arizona House of Representatives has 
20110111191108.000|20110111191111.000|TR0|drafted legislation that is designed to 
20110111191111.000|20110111191113.000|TR0|protect mourners by keeping protesters 300 
20110111191113.000|20110111191116.000|TR0|feet away.  Backers hope to rush it 
20110111191116.000|20110111191119.000|TR0|through the legislature so that the 
20110111191119.000|20110111191121.000|TR0|governor can sign it today.
20110111191121.000|20110111191124.000|TR0|
20110111191124.000|20110111191126.000|TR0|The protest plans are drawing, of course, 
20110111191126.000|20110111191129.000|TR0|widespread criticism from across Arizona's 
20110111191129.000|20110111191132.000|TR0|political spectrum.  CNN's John King spoke 
20110111191132.000|20110111191134.000|TR0|with representatives from the Republicans 
20110111191134.000|20110111191137.000|TR0|and Democrats and the Tea Party.

20110111192244.000|20110111192246.000|TR0|rubble.  We're checking in with baby Jenny

20110111192249.000|20110111192251.000|TR0|
20110111192251.000|20110111192254.000|TR0|(COMMERCIAL BREAK)
20110111192254.000|20110111192257.000|TR0|
20110111192257.000|20110111192259.000|TR0|SAVIDGE:  A year ago we watched as Haiti 
20110111192259.000|20110111192302.000|TR0|crumbled, and we shared their stories of 
20110111192302.000|20110111192304.000|TR0|heartbreak as the people dug out from the 
20110111192304.000|20110111192307.000|TR0|devastating earthquake.  But amidst the 
20110111192307.000|20110111192309.000|TR0|rubble, a tiny miracle, a beautiful baby 
20110111192309.000|20110111192312.000|TR0|girl who defied all odds and became a 
20110111192312.000|20110111192315.000|TR0|symbol of hope and survival.
20110111192315.000|20110111192317.000|TR0|
20110111192317.000|20110111192320.000|TR0|Now, a day before the anniversary of that 
20110111192320.000|20110111192322.000|TR0|deadly quake, baby Jenny is reunited with

20110111193630.000|20110111193633.000|TR0|move, the city's electrical provider plans

20110111194724.000|20110111194727.000|TR0|
20110111194727.000|20110111194730.000|TR0|DR. SANJAY GUPTA, CNN CHIEF MEDICAL 
20110111194730.000|20110111194732.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Martin, what they 
20110111194732.000|20110111194735.000|TR0|typically mean when they say they've 
20110111194735.000|20110111194737.000|TR0|beaten cancer is there's no evidence of 
20110111194737.000|20110111194740.000|TR0|disease.  NED, it's called.  You get a 
20110111194740.000|20110111194742.000|TR0|scan, like a CAT scan or a PET scan and 
20110111194742.000|20110111194745.000|TR0|you don't see any of evidence of disease.  
20110111194745.000|20110111194748.000|TR0|No evidence of the tumor remaining.
20110111194748.000|20110111194750.000|TR0|
20110111194750.000|20110111194753.000|TR0|Now, you know, as most doctors, health 
20110111194753.000|20110111194755.000|TR0|care professionals will point out, these 
20110111194755.000|20110111194758.000|TR0|tests have a certain limited accuracy.  
20110111194758.000|20110111194800.000|TR0|They're very good, but it's something, 
20110111194800.000|20110111194803.000|TR0|let's say, smaller than about six-tenths 
20110111194803.000|20110111194806.000|TR0|of a centimeter, it may be hard to pick 
20110111194806.000|20110111194808.000|TR0|up.  That's why doctors and teams are 
20110111194808.000|20110111194811.000|TR0|going to be very vigilant about following 
20110111194811.000|20110111194813.000|TR0|up on this.
20110111194813.000|20110111194816.000|TR0|
20110111194816.000|20110111194818.000|TR0|Now, I want to point out something about 
20110111194818.000|20110111194821.000|TR0|throat cancer in general.  Throat cancer 
20110111194821.000|20110111194824.000|TR0|is a bit of an umbrella term.  Throat 
20110111194824.000|20110111194826.000|TR0|cancer can mean cancer of the back of the 
20110111194826.000|20110111194829.000|TR0|tongue, of the gums, of the larynx, for 
20110111194829.000|20110111194831.000|TR0|example.  Anything sort of in that region. 
20110111194831.000|20110111194834.000|TR0| And depending on where the cancer came 
20110111194834.000|20110111194837.000|TR0|from, it behaves differently.  The 
20110111194837.000|20110111194839.000|TR0|likelihood of recurrence is different.  
20110111194839.000|20110111194842.000|TR0|Also, what caused it in the first place? 
20110111194842.000|20110111194844.000|TR0|Alcohol and tobacco, for example, are risk 
20110111194844.000|20110111194847.000|TR0|factors.  Human papillomavirus is a risk 
20110111194847.000|20110111194849.000|TR0|factor.  What sort of caused the cancer in 
20110111194849.000|20110111194852.000|TR0|the first place will affect the likelihood 
20110111194852.000|20110111194855.000|TR0|of recurrence.
20110111194855.000|20110111194857.000|TR0|
20110111194857.000|20110111194900.000|TR0|Now, when you talk about recurrence, the 
20110111194900.000|20110111194902.000|TR0|most common location for recurrence is in 
20110111194902.000|20110111194905.000|TR0|the lungs. Doctors over the next years, 
20110111194905.000|20110111194907.000|TR0|three to five years are going to be 
20110111194907.000|20110111194910.000|TR0|looking at his lungs as well as the back 
20110111194910.000|20110111194913.000|TR0|of his throat to see if there's evidence 
20110111194913.000|20110111194915.000|TR0|of recurrence, and if so, deciding on a 
20110111194915.000|20110111194918.000|TR0|treatment plan at that point.
20110111194918.000|20110111194920.000|TR0|
20110111194920.000|20110111194923.000|TR0|A lot of people have asked about what is 
20110111194923.000|20110111194925.000|TR0|the treatment for throat cancer?  Well, he 
20110111194925.000|20110111194928.000|TR0|got chemotherapy and radiation.  And it 
20110111194928.000|20110111194931.000|TR0|can be a very tough treatment, but also 
20110111194931.000|20110111194933.000|TR0|can sort of obviate the need for surgery.  
20110111194933.000|20110111194936.000|TR0|If he had surgery, for example, on his 
20110111194936.000|20110111194938.000|TR0|larynx, he would have lost his voice, for 
20110111194938.000|20110111194941.000|TR0|example.  Chemo and radiation can be a 
20110111194941.000|20110111194943.000|TR0|first line therapy.  It can be curative in 
20110111194943.000|20110111194946.000|TR0|certain cases.  And in his case, it sounds 
20110111194946.000|20110111194949.000|TR0|like it did the job in getting rid of any 
20110111194949.000|20110111194951.000|TR0|obvious signs of tumor.  He'll need to be 
20110111194951.000|20110111194954.000|TR0|monitored for the next several years.
20110111194954.000|20110111194956.000|TR0|
20110111194956.000|20110111194959.000|TR0|Good luck to him.  And Martin, back to you.
